title: Adaptive Social Studies Curriculum Design for Personalized Learning Support

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customized content recommendation and navigation support system reflecting adult learners' learning patterns

learning_goals: Learners can identify social studies materials required for personalized learning paths with over 80% accuracy using recommendation systems within the LMS (Learning Management System)
Learners can achieve self-set learning goals within four weeks with over 90% success through adaptive navigation support
Learners can submit project-based assessment tasks with 95% completion rates using personalized feedback mechanisms
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
